FOR THOSE WHO DON'T KNOW HOW TO JAILBREAK THEIR PS3 The easy way:

1. Download and install Legitimate sony 3.55 Firmware

2. Once installed download http://www.ps3-hacks.com/file/267

FOR THOSE WHO DON'T KNOW HOW TO JAILBREAK THEIR PS3 The easy way:

1. Download and install Legitimate sony 3.55 Firmware

2. Once installed download http://www.ps3-hacks.com/file/267

3. Get a any USB or Thumb drive and make sure its formatted to Fat32 or FAT file type (Right click then properties).

4. Make a folder in the root directory (first folder when you click into the USB) and make a folder called "PS3" and inside that folder make another folder named "UPDATE".

5. Paste your Official 3.55 Sony version and update
